title: I couldn't lock in my ban
body: In my ranked game I couldn't lock in my ban the button was grey. Then timer runs out and i get back to the lobby error message says the was a problem selecting your champion. Now I automatically got a lost on one of my promotion games to plat, just because the client was bugged. Thanks a lot :(

replies.body:
Anytime those lock in buttons don't work, it's because your network doesn't have a strong enough connection with our servers to send that information back and forth. You click the ban button, but that data never gets sent to the server so you don't end up actually banning anyone. 

Take a few minutes to look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still configured in the best way after the recent patch. Test those changes in a custom or practice game and let me know how it helps!
